content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
I used the "google" command to search for the best lodging and equipment rental options for kayaking in Norway near Naeroyfjord. My computer returned a list of websites including freewildsouls.com, nordicventures.com, and visitnorway.com. I then used the "browse_website" command to gather more information from https://www.visitnorway.com/things-to-do/outdoor-activities/canoeing-kayaking/ and found that it provides information on kayaking and other outdoor activities in Norway, emphasizing safety and local knowledge. It offers tips and recommendations for kayaking, including top destinations and rental options, and also provides information on accommodations and transportation. Additionally, it gives a general overview of other outdoor activities available in Norway.
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "browse_website", "args": {"url": "https://freewildsouls.com/destination/kayaking-naeroyfjord", "question": "What are the specific rental companies and lodging options near Naeroyfjord?"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content="Command browse_website returned: Answer gathered from website: a guide to kayaking in Naeroyfjord, Norway, with information on guided tours, kayak rentals, transportation, lodging recommendations, and other activities in the area. However, specific rental companies and lodging options are not mentioned. The third text is about a Squarespace web designer offering services to creative entrepreneurs and small businesses, with no relation to Naeroyfjord.\n\nLinks: ['\\n\\n\\n\\n\\n\\n\\n\\n\\n0\\n\\n\\n (https://freewildsouls.com/cart)', '\\n      Skip to Content\\n     (https://freewildsouls.com/destination/kayaking-naeroyfjord#page)', '\\n\\n (https://freewildsouls.com/)', '\\n        Journal\\n       (https://freewildsouls.com/journal)', '\\n\\n                  Destination Tips\\n                \\n (https://freewildsouls.com/destination)']", type='action_result')]
"""
